bibl.title: P.J. PARSONS and J.E.G. WHITEHORNE, with contributions by H. MAEHLER, M. MAEHLER, M.L. WEST, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LIX (Nos 3963-4008). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 79.)
